website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a 3D  filament that changes colors in UV light will find their match in this innovative product.
pros: Diameter of filament is remarkably consistent
Product created with high compatibility for a variety of 3D printing machines
Three color-changing options available to purchase
cons: Color-changing effect not as strong as some customers anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Product prints just fine, but the color effect was a little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Product prints just fine, but the color effect was a little disappointing. It does change color, but not as dramatically as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: pickard

customer_reviews.title: awesome filament, but it fades overtime
customer_reviews.text: This filament is great, it prints just like normal pla. The color changes very quickly when you put it in direct sunlight. It does not change indoors even in full sun through a window, it only changes in direct sunlight outside. I've had the statue print indoors for about 4 months on a table. it had sun on it through a window everyday. even though it was not changing color it was still absorbing the light. now it does not change color at all on one side. the same thing happened to the cube I printed.
customer_reviews.author: Kohlbush

customer_reviews.title: Not good, frustrating waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrible! It kept snapping going into the extruder and then printed out very rough, like thicker in some spots and other and making my hot end sound like a truck driving down a gravel road. If I pulled out this filament and put in a different kind all the issues went away so I know everything is tensioned correctly and the nozzle isn’t clogged. The color change is nice but I’ve only been able to print a small handful of simple statues. I tried the squirrel that came as the test file with my Ender 3 printer and the raft wouldn’t come off at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue color will not stay blue for long after UV exposure.
customer_reviews.text: This Amolen filament printed very well on a Geeetech A20M and Anet A8. The nonactivated color is white and the UV color is a wonderful blue. I really like the color however, the unfortunate issue is that it does not stay blue for very long. The Amolen pink, red, glow in the dark green colors retain their color change for a significant amount of time over what the blue is capable of doing.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Cool at first, but...
customer_reviews.text: It printed fine, and was pretty cool! We bought white to blue, it changed color in contact with sunlight and worked great. However, we left our print outside for a few days, just sitting on our patio table. Not even in direct sunlight. After about 3 or 4 days it completely stopped changing color at all. Now our print is just plain white. It even yellowed a bit and looks terrible. If it's going to stop changing and look terrible after only a few days, what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Chung

customer_reviews.title: The 200G spool tangles easily stopping the print job
customer_reviews.text: I have tried two different AMOLEN 200G spools, this pink UV and the bronze filament. Both tangled midway through a large job preventing the spool from paying out the filament and stopping the job. I would not buy the 200G version again.
customer_reviews.author: lcm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality filament, nice UV/Sunlight effect
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought this brand before so I've tried with a couple of 220g rolls and let me tell you: I'm impressed with the quality of the prints. After printing you need to expose the object to sunlight or UV light for the visualize the color change, once object is out of the light the color vanished after 2-3 minutes top. The Filament is prone to tangling so you need to look at it from time to time, that's the only thing preventing me to give a five star feedback. The boxes includes small rolls of sample filament (20 gr).
customer_reviews.author: Diego Pantoni

customer_reviews.title: It's fun color changing don't leave it in the sun too long
customer_reviews.text: This stuff's fun it's neat how it changes color in the sun don't leave it in the sun for too long or it changes to a weird brownish color and it never changes color again but the Cheshire cat I printed was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: You know you want it just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Product is super awesome! changes color quickly under sun; very cool effect, great for marketing materials! No issues at all, Same quality as always from Amolen!
customer_reviews.author: Reese Luckie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this Filament!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a while and printed many things out of it. Never stops amazing the people we print things in this filament!
customer_reviews.author: Amy McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Great, Filamnet
customer_reviews.text: This is another first for me and this filament did not disappoint. Prints like butter.
customer_reviews.author: RDesilets

customer_reviews.title: Needs direct sunlight to see good blue color
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had more colors, Wish it worked better in low sunlight. But it did what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Garbinski

customer_reviews.title: Great, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.text: Good novelty filament. I didnt have any problems at all. Extruder-210c Bed-50c
customer_reviews.author: Rich Barth

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my son as a gift - he said it worked great in his 3 d printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this filament. Prints well and looks even better when outside in the sunlight!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: did not change colors
customer_reviews.text: It just didn't work.. printed fine so I used it for knick knacks but there was no color changing to it... the green to yellow sample sent with it worked but the white to pink was just a cloudy clear plastic...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick Changing color
customer_reviews.text: Printed at 190 works really well. Super shiny and smooth at white and a brighter purple than the photo. Bed temp 60
customer_reviews.author: B Andrews

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. The owner was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient Alien

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant fast change
customer_reviews.text: Filament prints great and the change when exposed to uv is incredibly fast and vibrant. The spool is a little small for the price but generally with these specialty filaments your not gonna use tons at a time anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs some fine tuning
customer_reviews.text: I have been testing this out for a little bit and it seems to do good with large prints, but with thin walls or fine details it seems to struggle. I have trying to slow it down so it doesn't string so much and so far I have that dialed in, but I'm still working on getting it to not extrude so crazy. Leaves lots of artifacts with fine prints. Maybe my profile isn't dialed in 100%? Whatever the reason its taking me a little bit to try to get good prints out of it. So far no tangles so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kellum

customer_reviews.title: Great quality would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great quality filament. Very clean prints and the before and after color change is shown in the picture. Excellent quality and easy to print with. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Travis

product_meta.title: AMOLEN 3D Printer Filament, UV/Sunlight Color Change to Blue PLA Filament 1.75mm +/- 0.03 mm, 200G/0.44lb, Includes Sample UV Color Change to Purple Filament - 100% USA
feature_bullets: UV/ SUNLIGHT CHANGING COLOR - Photochromatic filaments that are capable of changing colors when exposed to sunlight or UV light source
HIGH COMPATIBILITY - Perfectly compatible with most of the FDM 3D Printer, 1.75mm filament consistent diameter, dimensional accuracy +/- 0.03mm
SMOOTHLY PRINT- Orderly wrapped, melt well, feed smoothly and constantly without clogging the nozzle or extruder
PREMIER MATERIAL - Raw materials are from USA, eco-friendly with good performance
HIGH PERFORMANCE - Good shaping, no bubble, no jamming, no warping

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
